subject: World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: The World Cup that begins Friday in Germany with 32 teams and 736 players is certain to offer surprises and upsets.  Not surprising, however, will be its role as a showcase for a new vanguard of young players.
snippet: The World Cup that begins Friday in Germany with 32 teams and 736 players is certain to offer surprises and upsets.  Not surprising, however, will be its role as a showcase for a new vanguard of young players.
